Array: * Kris,^05 I think I\n  might remember the\n  rules!
* So...^05 pink tiles don't\n  do anything.
* Yellow tiles are walls\n  that hurt you.
* Orange tiles make you\n  smell like oranges.
* Purple tiles make you\n  go to the next\n  tile...
* ... And make you smell\n  like lemons.
* Blue tiles don't do\n  anything if you don't\n  smell like oranges.
* ... And if they aren't\n  next to a yellow\n  tile.
* It'll act like a\n  yellow tile if it's\n  next to one.
* And it'll otherwise\n  be a wall if you\n  smell like oranges.
* And white tiles will\n  end the puzzle.
* That's what I took\n  away from that,^05 so\n  I hope that helps,^05 Kris.
